Headline: Temporary Northbound #94 California Reroute near California/35th Street
ShortDescription: Northbound 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted near California/35th Street.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 35th, Western, 31st, California, and resume normal route, due to, street blockage near California/35th Street.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Dempster-Skokie-bound Yellow Line Service Delayed near Skokie
ShortDescription: Dempster-Skokie-bound Yellow Line trains are standing with major delays near Skokie due to a stalled train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Dempster-Skokie-bound Yellow Line trains are standing with major delays near Skokie due to a stalled train.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include: Bus #97 Skokie bus.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
